title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 90.6 - Public access, use and recreation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 90.6 - Public access, use and recreation

State Regulations
(a) Travel by motor vehicle or on foot is
permitted on designated travel routes for the purpose of nature study, photography and sightseeing during daylight hours. (b) No person shall travel other than on
designated travel routes. (c) No
person shall be in the area after dark. (d) No person shall have a pet in the area
unless it is on a leash. (e) No
person shall be intoxicated while in the area. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
90.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
